name: Jump Pixel Jump!! -Remastered
description: Jump Pixel Jump!! - Remastered is a hyper-casual game based on a pixel-art style, your objective in this awesome games is to beat your own high scores and others by beating all the obstacles on a procedural infinite world, moreover, you are able to unlock unique and awesome skins which can be modified as you prefer!! and everything just by jumping and passing over all the obstacles.
